Topic.Title: How to not show the room title

Posts.EditableText: I dont want to see "Bus" or "cabinet" because it messes up the inmersion.  But I just cant change it or make it invisible.
Posts.HTML: I dont want to see "Bus" or "cabinet" because it messes up the inmersion. But I just cant change it or make it invisible.

Posts.EditableText: Select Game on the left. select room descriptions tab at top. Under room description layout, make room name a '0'.
Posts.HTML: Select Game on the left. select room descriptions tab at top. Under room description layout, make room name a '0'.

Posts.EditableText:
You can also do ```request (Hide, "Location")``` or if you'd prefer ```JS.uiHide ("#location")``` . 
That way you can turn it on/off easily during gameplay (i.e. if you want to show the location in some rooms but not all).
Posts.HTML:
You can also do request (Hide, "Location") or if you'd prefer JS.uiHide ("#location") .
That way you can turn it on/off easily during gameplay (i.e. if you want to show the location in some rooms but not all).

Posts.EditableText: In the game object under the interface tab uncheck 'classic location style', then uncheck the 'show location bar' option.
Posts.HTML: In the game object under the interface tab uncheck 'classic location style', then uncheck the 'show location bar' option.
